briefTitle: Clinical Study of Camrelizumab Combined With TCb Versus TCb in Neoadjuvant Treatment of Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open Label, Parallel Controlled, Multicenter Phase II Clinical Study of Carelizumab Combined With TCb (Docetaxel+Carboplatin) Versus TCb Neoadjuvant Therapy for Triple Negative Breast Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Triple Negative Breast Cancer, Camrelizumab
